content.p: It is advisable to open a bank account whilst you are studying in Malaysia. It is the safest and most convenient way of managing your finances and enables you to: To open a bank account in Malaysia you will need the following: This ATM is available on campus under Affin Bank â”€ located at Block H, the Student Association Building. This ATM is linked with MEPS, PLUS, CIRRUS, Maestro. The networks enable you to withdraw money by using ATM cards from other banks with the same network / credit cards from around the country. There are branches of local and international banks in Semenyih and Kajang area. All international students are strongly recommended to go to the nearest bank for your own convenience. Explore the options carefully to find out which one will suit your needs. Ensure that your account is active even if you are not in Malaysia for more than two months and maintain a balance of RM100.
